SELECT o.order_num AS orderId, o.member_num AS memberNum, o.order_date AS orderDate, o.order_status AS orderStatus, i.item_name AS itemName, i.item_price AS itemPrice, i.item_image AS itemImage, i.item_info AS itemInfo, i.item_status AS itemStatus, i.item_date AS itemDate, p.total_price AS totalPrice, p.purchase_ok AS purchaseOk, p.payment_date AS paymentDate FROM purchase p JOIN anvd_order o ON p.order_id = o.order_id JOIN item i ON o.item_num = i.item_num WHERE p.purchase_ok = '구매완료'
